org.opengrok.indexer.web

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.web.Statistics

  • public class Statistics
extends Object
    Framework for statistics gathering. So far used only by the webapp.
    Author:
    Krystof Tulinger
